suggested_query: Ornament refers to any decorative object or feature that serves to beautify or embellish something. It can be a physical object, such as a vase, a statue, or a piece of jewelry, or an intangible element, such as a pattern, a design, or a color scheme. In architecture, ornament is used to add visual interest and to enhance the overall aesthetic appeal of a building or structure. In art, ornament is often used to create a sense of texture, depth, or dimensionality.
